name: Fading Shadows
summary:
ading Shadows is a puzzle game set in a vast real-life world with fantasy elements. Navigate your sphere using the beam of light. You will meet numerous obstacles on your way - reveal ancient writings, set fire, reflect light in the mirrors, and evaporate water. Your sphere can change in substance. 
 
50 unique levels 
Travel through dungeons, swamps, snow-covered mountains, rivers, and beautiful gardens 
Set fire and evaporate water 
Three types of sphere: glass, wood, and metal; each with its own characteristics 
Numerous interactive mechanisms 
High score table 
Tutorial to practice your controls 
There is a story behind the game 
2-player's co-operative mode
